wikitext.*:
'''Regent''' ([[Quenya|Q.]] ''karma-kundo'') can refer to:
==Arda==
*[[Regent of Gondor]], title of a person granted authority by the [[King of Gondor|king]] to rule [[Gondor]] on his behalf. 
**[[Minalcar]], the only known Regent of Gondor
*[[Regent of Númenor]], title of Regents ruling on behalf of any [[King of Númenor]].
**[[Hallatan|Hallatan of Hyarnastorni]], a [[Númenóreans|Númenórean]] lord who ruled as regent on behalf of [[Tar-Aldarion]].
==See also==
*[[Underking]], equivalent position in [[Rohan]]
{{disambig}}
